comment.author: 54209975@N07
comment._content:
I believe this is a photo of a SM8. Review the rudder, tailwheel, the angle brace that goes forward from the oleo/strut intersection, yep, it all says SM8. 
  I have a SM2 under restoration and a SM8 project hanging in my hangar, plus many drawings so I'm pretty sure on this one.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
